column3: Faculty of Health, Science, Social Care and Education
column5: This course is aimed at employed, experienced registered health care professionals, preparing them for an advanced clinical practitioner role.Â The course consists of a mix of core modules, which address the four pillars of advanced clinical practice, and a selection of clinical option modules, which allow students to build a programme relevant to their area of practice. You will prepare a portfolio of practice showcasing your application of learning towards the advanced clinical practitioner role.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
